text: Dubai Medical College for Girls is the first private college awarding degree of Medicine & Surgery in the United Arab Emirates. Established in 1985, Dubai Medical College (DMC) is focused on giving students medical training to acquire a certified degree of Bachelor in Medicine and Surgery in the UAE. The school will accomplish its main goal by giving a learning atmosphere, both inside and outside the classroom that manages Islamic values and encourages elevated levels of student accomplishment, constantly with the highest measures of educational brilliance.https://www.edarabia.com/16755/dubai- medical-college-for-girls-dmcg/ ==References== ==External links== * Dubai Medical College for Girls Category:Universities and colleges in Dubai Category:Women's universities and colleges in United Arab Emirates Category:Educational institutions established in 1985 Category:Medical schools in the United Arab Emirates Category:1985 establishments in the United Arab Emirates
title: Dubai Medical College
